Package com.eventApp.Service

Class ClubService

java.lang.Object
com.eventApp.Service.ClubService
public class ClubService extends Object
Service class managing operations related to clubs, events, and club members. Provides methods for CRUD operations, event navigation, data export, and more.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClubService

      public ClubService()
      Default constructor.

    • ClubService

      public ClubService(User user) throws SQLException, DatabaseExceptionHandler, ClassNotFoundException
      Overloaded constructor that loads the event list for the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose club events should be loaded
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while loading events
      DatabaseExceptionHandler - if there is a custom database related exception
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found

  • Method Details

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(Event event) throws ValidationException, SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Creates a new event in the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object to be created
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the event data is invalid
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during event creation
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found

    • getClubByUser

      public Club getClubByUser(User user)
      Retrieves the club associated with the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose club is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Club object associated with the user

    • getClubMember

      public List<ClubMember> getClubMember(User user) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves and returns a sorted list of club members belonging to the same club as the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose club members are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Sorted list of ClubMember objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while fetching club members
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found

    • getParticipant

      public List<Student> getParticipant(int eventId) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves and returns a sorted list of students participating in a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event
      Returns:
      Sorted list of Student participants
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while fetching participants
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found

    • exportClubMembersToCSV

      public void exportClubMembersToCSV(List<ClubMember> clubMemberList, String filePath) throws IOException
      Exports a list of club members to a CSV file at the specified file path. The CSV contains user ID, name, email, and position.
      Parameters:
      clubMemberList - List of club members to export
      filePath - Destination file path for the CSV
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during writing to the file

    • getAllEventNames

      public List<String> getAllEventNames(String userId)
      Retrieves a sorted list of all event names for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID whose event names are requested
      Returns:
      Sorted list of event names

    • loadMyEventList

      public void loadMyEventList(User user) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, DatabaseExceptionHandler
      Loads the circular linked list of events for the club associated with the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose club events are loaded
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while loading events
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found
      DatabaseExceptionHandler - if there is a custom database related exception

    • viewCurrentEvent

      public Event viewCurrentEvent()
      Returns the current event in the circular event list.
      Returns:
      The current Event object

    • viewNextEvent

      public Event viewNextEvent()
      Moves to and returns the next event in the circular event list.
      Returns:
      The next Event object

    • cancelEvent

      public void cancelEvent() throws SQLException, DatabaseExceptionHandler, ClassNotFoundException
      Cancels the current event by updating its status in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during cancellation
      DatabaseExceptionHandler - if there is a custom database related exception
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event currentEvent) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, DatabaseExceptionHandler
      Updates the details of the given event in the database.
      Parameters:
      currentEvent - The event object with updated information
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during update
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver class is not found
      DatabaseExceptionHandler - if there is a custom database related exception
